TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ClaimTypes extends System.Object
public ref class ClaimTypes abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表實體可宣告之宣告的預先定義型別。

span.span: Represents the pre-defined types of claims that an entity can claim.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 類別在 中搜尋特定型別的宣告或建立宣告。Use the class to search for a particular type of claim in a or to create a claim. 若要在 中搜尋特定型別的宣告，請使用 `claimType` 方法，並且使用這個類別的屬性指定 參數的宣告型別。To search for a particular type of claim in a , use the method and use the properties of this class to specify the claim type for the `claimType` parameter. 當 類別的建構函式是用來建立新宣告時，可使用 類別的屬性來指定 `claimType` 參數。When the constructor for the class is used to create a new claim, use the properties of the class to specify the `claimType` parameter. 對於許多宣告型別而言， 類別的靜態屬性會傳回特定型別的宣告。For many of the claim types, the class has static properties that return a claim of a specific type. 例如， 方法會使用 宣告型別傳回宣告。For instance, the method returns a claim using the claim type. ## Examples [!code-csharp[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimtypes/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[c_ClaimTypes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/c_claimtypes/vb/service.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Anonymous As String
public: static property System::String ^ Anonymous { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得指定匿名使用者之宣告的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

value.span: 指定匿名使用者之宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Authentication As String
public: static property System::String ^ Authentication { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得宣告的 URI，這個宣告會明確指出有關是否已驗證識別的詳細資料。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

value.span: 宣告的 URI，這個宣告會明確指出有關是否已驗證識別的詳細資料。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AuthorizationDecision As String
public: static property System::String ^ AuthorizationDecision { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得宣告的 URI，這個宣告會明確指出針對實體的授權決策。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

value.span: 宣告的 URI，這個宣告會明確指出針對實體的授權決策。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Country As String
public: static property System::String ^ Country { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得指定實體所在國家/地區之宣告的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides.

value.span: 指定實體所在國家/地區之宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies a country/region in which an entity resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DateOfBirth As String
public: static property System::String ^ DateOfBirth { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.

value.span: 指定實體生日之宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DenyOnlySid As String
public: static property System::String ^ DenyOnlySid { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得宣告的 URI，這個宣告會指定實體的指定禁用 (Deny-Only) 安全識別項 (SID)。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity.

value.span: 指定宣告的 URI，這個宣告會指定實體的指定禁用 SID。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only SID for an entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定禁用 SID 不會讓指定的實體存取安全物件。A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object. 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Dns As String
public: static property System::String ^ Dns { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得指定 DNS 名稱之宣告的 URI，該 DNS 名稱與電腦名稱或 X.509 憑證主體或發行者之替代名稱相關聯。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.

value.span: 用來指定 DNS 名稱之宣告的 URI，該 DNS 名稱與電腦名稱或 X.509 憑證主體或發行者之替代名稱相關聯。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property System As String
public: static property System::String ^ System { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得識別系統實體之宣告的 URI。

span.span: Gets the URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

value.span: 識別系統實體之宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當發行者為目前應用程式時， 通常會用來識別宣告的發行者。The is typically used to identify the issuer of a claim when the issuer is the current application. 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.

public: static property System::String ^ Thumbprint { System::String ^ get(); };

value.span: 指定指紋之宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指紋是 X.509 憑證的全域唯一 SHA-1 雜湊。A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate. 這個屬性所傳回的字串是http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint。The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property X500DistinguishedName As String
public: static property System::String ^ X500DistinguishedName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，這個字串包含 X.509 憑證之辨別名稱宣告的 URI。

span.span: Gets the string that contains the URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

value.span: X.509 憑證之辨別名稱宣告的 URI。

span.span: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X.500 標準定義的方法可用來定義 X.509 憑證使用的辨別名稱。The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that is used by X.509 certificates.
